title: Ep. 02 - 2 Bears 1 Cave 2w/ Tom Segura & Bert Kreischer
description: Tom Segura and Bert Kreischer are back for Episode 2 of 2 BEARS 1 CAVE! The two best friends get right into the stories, discussing Ralphie May, Joy Koy, Greg Giraldo and Jim Norton. Plus, Tom recaps all of his Theo trolling from the past few months. Who would be at the ultimate comedian slumber party? Bert's daughter is starting to drive, which is getting dicey, and everything wraps up in a strip club.
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
